description.zh: 本實習課程設計,讓學生經由儀器及裝置的操作印證理論,內容包含物理化學.聚合物合成,高分子物性檢測,環工檢測技術,生化發酵技術,表面化學技!,乳化技,電化學技術以及有機物合成與分析技術等.
description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

notes: 待聘-李瑞元,合進二化三

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

notes: 與四建四/四創四/進二建五合開

description.zh: 自動化機械相關機電界面等技術問題，內容包括自動化機構、致動器、感測器、控制器等之原理介紹，並配合機電整合設備，使同學由實習中獲得機電整合之概念。
description.en: Interface Techniques Concerning Automatic Machinery; Subjects Include Theory and Application Know-How of Mechanisms, Actuators, Sensors, And Controllers; Experiments also provided.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001016或負責教授同意。介紹雷射加工設備、雷射切割、雷射銲接、雷射表面處理及加工時之安全要項。
description.en: Introduction to laser machining device, laser cutting, laser welding, laser surface treatment and the safety items during laser machine operation.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力系統控制，系統保護。
description.en: Symmetrical components, unbalanced fault, generator model, stability, voltage control system, power system control,

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 1. 諧振式轉換器2. 交換式直流電源供應器3. 不斷電供電系流4. 馬達驅動器的應用5. 電力品質應用
description.en: 1. Resonant Converter2. Switching Mode Power Supplies3. Uninterruptable Power Supply System4. Motor Drive Applications5. Power Quality Applications

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討熱量與質量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the heat and mass transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering.

notes: 待聘-崔宏瑋,合進二化四

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 由於重大工程建設陸續開發，對環境之衝擊也日益明顯，因此環境影響評估制度之建立與執行也極為迫切，環境影響評估確能有效抑制開發工程中所可能形成的污染行為，本課程之目的即在介紹環境影響評估制度的演進、各國相關之評估法制、環境影響評估之應用、評估方法（專家委員法、圖形重疊法、矩陣法及網路法）、評估流程及環境影響評估之追蹤考核等單元，期使選修者，對環境影響評估建立正確和科學的認知。
description.en: EIA (Environmental Impact Assessment) is interdisciplinary and involves large numbers of different practicals.In this course the theory will be firstly introduced,then the case studies will also be discussed.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of earth structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground improvement techniques.

description.zh: 使學習者瞭解土壤與岩石之性質對隧道設計、開挖之相互關係。課程內容包括隧道工程介紹、隧道之荷重及應力分佈、地質調查、支撐及襯砌設計、各類隧道施工之方法及計測儀器之說明。
河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其免受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體硬體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程係針對大學生授課標準研擬有關個人及企業投資及財務之管理。本課程之目的在使學生瞭解如何使相關之投資獲得良好報酬，介紹企業財務結構。企業資金分配情形。企業如何籌措資金及相關財務理論之應用。本課程研究內容包括：財務市場結構、利息因子、財務規畫及分析、股票、債券、租借問題、資金預算分配及風險性、長期借貸、有價證券等。
description.en: This course includes modern theory of business finance with emphasis on analytical and quantitative skills, treatment of firm's investment financing, dividend decisions in a valuation framework, survey of related empirical work, net present value, portfolio theory, capital asset pricing model, efficient capital markets, option theory, and effect of inflation.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis.  Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed.  It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格2.企業環境的偵察3.策略形成4.策略執行與評估5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function innvolved in management.The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning.The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 本課程分二年（四學期）教授，在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

name.en: Introduction of the Architecture for the aged

description.zh: 1.研討老人身心特性與生活需求特徵。2.介紹老人居住設施種類與空間機能。3.了解老人社區活動與外出行動模式。
description.en: 1.To study and discuss the attributions of ageds' mental and   body and the characteristics of their live needs2.To introduce the types of the ageds' inhabitation   facilities and their space and functions.3.To understand the ageds' social activities and their outdoor behaviors' moods

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹生產業與服務業中之作業管理。其中包含預測、產品與服務設計、產能規劃、地點選擇規劃分析、存貨管理、及時系統與供應鏈管理、專案管理、及品質管理。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduction operation management in industry and service. It includes forecasting, product and service design, capacity planning, location selection and analysis planning, inventory management, just-in-time and supply chain management, project management, and quality management.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹鋼筋混凝土構材受到軸向力、彎曲力矩、剪力、扭轉力矩及握裹力之分析，並依據鋼筋混凝土設計規範之規定，將設計理論使用於梁、版、柱、基礎等土木構造物之實務設計上。本課程除授於鋼筋混凝土之基本力學原理及實務設計與施工規定外，並建立鋼筋混凝土結構之正確設計理念，培養對鋼筋混凝土構造之分析與設計能力。主要授課內容如下:.鋼筋混凝土材料性質.設計載重與設計規範.梁之撓曲設計與剪力設計.鋼筋之續接、彎起或截斷及彎矩容量圖.鋼筋混凝土柱分析與設計.版之係數設計法、直接設計法及版之降伏線理論.基礎設計.鋼筋混凝土梁柱之耐震設計
description.en: The behaviors of reinforced concrete members subject to the axial force, bending moment and shear are introduced in this course. The design codes and practical design examples of beam, column, slab and foundation are also introduced. The major topics are listed below..Materials of reinforced concrete.Design loading and design code .Design of beam for bending and shear .Development, Splices, and Bar Cutoffs.Analysis and design of column .Design of slab .Design of foundation

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

name.en: Introduction to Integration of Production Planning and Control

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動也結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。發展自動化及電子化之同時，也該就相關知識及資訊進行整合，如此方能生產規劃與現場控制之相關活動作最好之協調。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於規劃與控制之相關知識，以及進行整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore，the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for integrating production planning and shop floor control.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程是依大學課程標準訂定，適合於二技及四技學生修習有關工程投資分析與相關問題之探討。本課程之目的在尋找能使工程投資之獲利或報酬最佳化的相關方法，並介紹學生瞭解工程投資方案之本質；如何做預算分配，使得投資得到最佳報酬；工程投資環境；及投資方案之分析法。本課程包括下列主題：利率因素及通貨膨脹、稅率及匯兌之效應、資金預算分配問題、不確定性及風險性、投資方案之各種層面分析：生產、經濟、管理、環保及政治等方面。
description.en: The objective of this course is to examine the engineering investment decision problems. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, tax and exchange rate, capital budgeting, uncertainty and risk, investment projects and its relationships with production, economics, management, environment, and politics.

notes: 上限30人 與進二工三合開

description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用孼費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程分二年（四學期）教授，在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.	cases studies

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

name.en: Introduction to History of Modern Architecture

description.zh: 待修正；本課程大致依下列階段進行：1.基本歷史背景介紹及特有名詞介紹、2.現代建築的盟芽期1850-1900、3.現代建築成長期1900-1920、4.現代建築黃金期1920-1930、5.二次大戰前現代建築概況回顧。
本課程以討論建築物有關的熱、通風、換氣、光、聲音等之物理問題。授課內容分為三大部分：第一部分關係室內氣候者如通風、換氣、隔熱等之方法以創造快適之室內氣候。第二部分與光學有關之日光照射、日光輻射、自然光之採集、人工光之應用。第三部分則為與聲音有關之室內音響狀態之改善及噪音之隔斷等。
課程主要透過電腦圖形的表現及動畫的介紹來深入探討它們在建築上的應用,尤其是在"虛擬"及"實境"領域。利用現有之應用軟體,如AutoCAD及3DS,學生將從模型的基本建立、表現及動畫到影像的輸出或者結合多媒體應用等相關之技術。課程內容部份將會傳授並調查如何經由新的媒介來傳達我們在建築空間的認知與成果。
description.en: This course will focus on advanced technologies in the production and presentation of computer-based rendering and animation and their particular uses in relationship to architecture, both "real" and "virtual." Using 3DVIZ, students will model, render, and animate projects for output to video or for use in multimedia presentations. Readings will investigate how new media transform our perception and production of architectural space. Computer Visualization or a thorough knowledge of the fundamentals of computer modeling is prerequisites.

description.zh: 1.建築表現之功能與意義。 2. 比例與明暗之訓練。3.鉛筆、色鉛筆、水彩、麥克筆、噴筆之基本技巧。4.各種圖面之表達。5.圖面安排設計。 6.表現法與設計意念。
description.en: 1. The methodology of Architecture presentation. 2. Proportion and contrast. 3. Basic technique of pencil, color pencil, watercolor, speedy colors and Airbrush Rendering. 4. The application on all kind of architecture drawing. 5. The Presentational Planning. 6. The Presentation of the design image.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing.

notes: 需先修過上學期建築製圖課程同學

The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of solving related problems. The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics: linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory, non-linear programming, markevo chain,, wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliability, decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹組織內個人之行為以及團體間之種種管理；課程之內容大綱如下：組織行為之功能、組織行為之基礎－個人部份、組織行為之核心、組織動力學、組織行為之過程與結構。
description.en: This course introduces individual behavior in an organization and the management among the organizations. The course is consisted of functions of the organizational behavior (OB), fundamental of OB for individual, core of (OB), and processes and structure of (OB).

description.zh: 本課程目的在培養學生有關產經的理論基礎，一開始將對產經學門的分析架構與演變做一介紹，之後則對各項分析理論進行解說。理論方面將包括廠商理論、獨占廠商理論、寡占廠商理論等。對於理論的應用上則使用個案研討的方式。
description.en: The industrial economics is concerned with how productive activities are brought into harmony with the demand for goods and services through some organizing mechanism.  In additions, this course will also teach the students how variations and imperfections in the organizing mechanism affect the success achieved in satisfying an economy's wants.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

description.zh: 以實務應用的角度，幫助同學瞭解市場調查的涵義，發展及進行程序。其次以實際演練的方式，透過問卷的設計及發放，蒐集相關資料，並協助同學應用軟體，將市調所得資料進行整理、分析與解釋，最後以市場調查綜合個案報告之演練方式，以培養同學市場調查相關活動的基本概念與能力。
description.en: To help the students to know the connotation, development and procedure of marketing Research by the view of practice application.  In addition, to help the students to design and distribute the questionnaire. To collect, analysis and explain the data of market survey by using computer software.

description.zh: 本課程藉由理論說明與實例探討，讓同學能夠了解理財規劃的運作及財富管理現況，並引導同學應用所學專業來分析財經時事，以提升個人理財規劃效能，養成對趨勢、產業發展及投資判斷的智慧，本課程並安排實務業之專業人士，針對相關課程主題做深入介紹及實務經驗分享。
description.en: This course aims to provide a solid foundation which is essential for creating and managing an investment portfolio for individual clients. It focuses on the practical application of portfolio management and asset allocation processes in the context of wealth management for individual investors. With an introduction to the fundamental principles and the financial planning process, this course emphasizes on the provision of investment advisory services. It discusses client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues before applying the concepts and techniques to construct and manage investment portfolios for the client.In addition, this course incorporates other wealth management issues including consumption planning, asset acquisition and retirement planning in designing a financial plan.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1.Core 的特性分析2.Choke 設計3.高頻變壓器設計4.Core 的特性實習5.Choke 實習6.高頻變壓器實習
description.en: 1.Analysis of core2.Design of choke3.High frequency transformer design4.Practice of core,choke and high frequency transformer

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink簡介2. 控制系統建模3. 線性時變控制系統分析4. 可觀測性與可控制性5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析6. 曲線擬合與系統建模7. 控制器設計8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

name.zh: 材料特性與熱管理實務應用

description.zh: 在諸多工程應用實例中，如LED、晶片之散熱問題、流體在能源系統中之熱交換、燃料電池衍生之熱問題等，都與材料之規格選用、處理方法、加工方式、製造過程有明顯的相關性。本門課程主要針對材料工程與熱管理相關的技術問題，提出探討與對策，期使學生對熱管理在材料與系統工程上的應用提供適當的專業知識。
description.en: In engineering applications, such as LED, chip cooling, heat exchange in energy systems, fuel cells, are always comes with the problems of thermal generation. Meanwhile, manufacturing process and heat treatment of these products are also strongly dependent of the selection of material specifications. The purpose of this course would like to employ practical problems and lead the students in finding appropriate solutions or technical approaches to solve the related problems they could meet.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討學校評鑑理論與實務相關議題，其次瞭解各國技職學校評鑑現況，並提出相關資訊以作為修正與改進當前技職學校評鑑實務的指引。
description.en: This course first discusses the concept of school evaluation, followed by a presentation of case studies of school evaluation from across the World. We also provide information to project staff and key stakeholders as a guide for revision and improvement of project plans, management, utilization of resources and training activities

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

name.en: An introduction to sustainable architectural research

description.zh: 本課程主要係針對全球化與國際化時代來臨後，身為地球村的一份子如何整合因對永續建築與環境不同價值觀所帶來之衝擊，並透過客觀研究與實際案例具體提出適切的解決之道，以取得永續建築與環境所存在異同之平衡。課程期望透過引導並激發研究者在面對永續建築與環境之種種議題時，能夠同時尋求人類與建築以及環境三者間共存共榮之最適當方式。學習過程中，研究者除必需提出理論與實務案例做為研究之基礎外，傳授者同時亦將由研究討論過程中了解研究者個別之特質，並依照其不同特質協助研究者建立正確的邏輯思維，以建立建築專業道德與卓越價值觀，以期確實能夠使研究者在精確掌握時代趨勢的前提下，提出符合建築專業研究對於永續建築與環境兩者異同平衡之解決策略與妥善建議，並期望藉由研究能夠更進一步獲得社會對於建築專業研究之認同，最終達到永續建築與環境平衡之目標。
description.en: This course targeting mainly after the era of globalization and internationalization, who is a member of the global village how to integration for sustainable construction and environmental impact of the different values, and through objective research and the case specifying the appropriate solutions, in order to achieve sustainable architectural and environmental similarities and differences that exist in balance. Courses through guided and inspired researchers in when confronted with various issues of sustainable architecture and environment, while seeking human and architectural and environmental coexistence and common prosperity among the three most appropriate manners. Learning process in the, researchers except required made theory and practice case do for research of based outside, taught who while also will by research discussion process in the understanding researchers individual of trait, and pursuant to its different trait assist researchers established correctly of logical

description.zh: 課程通過一系列關於城市的文本(文學、電影、建築、或其他藝術），思考人跟城市的關係：文化產物如何呈現城市，和城市設計如何給不同思潮影響。如果都市化成了大趨勢，如果我們當下的存在處境離不開城市及對它的想象，我們就有理由研究城市和建築空間在不同歷史脈絡下如何影響人，和如何閱讀城市這充滿符號的文本。課程會介紹關於城市的著作、論述和理論，也會探討如現代性、後現代主義、全球化、殖民主義、解構等議題。如可能，課程會安排實地考察。
description.en: Through works of fiction, films, architecture and urbanscape, this course examines how the city is represented in texts and how cities have shaped thinking. We will examine both the visible features of a city (architecture, monumental buildings, preservation projects) and also what Calvino means by the 'invisible city.'  Cities represented in texts include Manchester, London, Paris, St. Petersburg, Buenos Aires, New York, Shanghai, Taipei, Hong Kong and Macau. Topics concerning modernity, postmodernism, globalization, colonization, and deconstruction will be explored. A field trip may be included if feasible.

description.zh: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識、瞭解真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式。關乎創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學，探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。
description.en: This course aims to meet the needs of advanced learners of English who are in the pursuit of near-native knowledge and understanding of English lexical use in real-world communication. Lexical pragmatics concerns itself with the creative and at the same time mainstream, re-occurring patterns of lexical variations. The recent rapidly growing area of lexical pragmatics explores lexical dynamics as well as their underpinning rhetorical functions, such as phenomena of meaning narrowing, expansion, evolution, deviation, modification, etc.

description.zh: 課程專為欲深度瞭解英文文學史的中學教師與研究所學生而設計。課程將引領學生研讀17世紀至今的英國文學文本，種類包含詩、戲劇、小說與自傳。學生需利用課內與課外的時間研讀文本，以利學生跳脫其熟悉之課程框架，於實務教學思維上有所創新發想。本課程之評分將以實際的教學示範、短篇寫作作業，以及學生參與程度為主要標準，論文報告次之。
description.en: This course is designed for the high school teacher and for any graduate student who wants a thorough background in the history of English literature. Students will read British literary texts from the seventh century to the present in the genres of poetry, drama, fiction, and autobiography. Some texts will be read outside of class; others will be read/acted in class, allowing students to come away with practical teaching ideas for their own classes. This course, instead of culminating in a major seminar paper, is graded based on sample teaching demonstrations, shorter writing assignments, and student participation.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers，Design of sensing element , Signal Conditioning Circuit Design，Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor， Fabrication of sensor，Selection and Application of the sensors.。

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括1.合併的動機與理論介紹，2.購併的型態與策略規畫，3.公司購併時的法律規畫4.美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5.美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討6.金融控股公司相關議題，7.合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

description.zh: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要包含以下三個部份：第一部份介紹風險值，將從近來風險管理的理論與實務發展討論其起源與基本觀念；第二部份說明衡量風險值的方法，包括變異數共變數法、歷史模擬、蒙地卡羅模擬及壓力測試；第三部份從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
description.en: This course gives students an overview of VaR, viewed in its broader risk management context. Totally, there will be three parts in this course. Part One is an introduction, which discusses the origins and basics of VaR in the context of recent developments in the theory and practice of risk management. Part Two deals with the approaches of measuring VaR, including variance-covariance approach, historical simulation, Mote Carlo simulation and stress testing. Part Three then deals with risk management issues from a VaR perspective, including 1) decision-making rules, such as investment and hedging rules; 2) credit risks; 3) liquidity, operational and legal risks; 4) capital allocation; 5) firm-wide risk management.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

description.zh: 介紹日本設計思維與研究成果，包含日文中設計的相關詞語，藉由導讀與討論設計相關日文期刊雜誌與書籍体驗日本的設計思維。並透過課題演練以達到設計文化交流的積極意義。

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

Client and Server architecture :NT Client server, window 2000 Client /Server, and Linux Client/Server.4. Introduction to database system. 5.Relational database and transact-SQL. 6. System analysis and database normalization. 7. Distributed database and administrator of the database.8. Developmented tools of web-database : Java, CGI, J-builder, IIS,ASP. 9.Applications in practial operation-line.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹 (2)嵌入式系統應用 (3)嵌入式系統硬體 (4)嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5)中斷處理 (6)記憶體管理 (7)週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and appro92hes, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹準則作曲的概念與技巧、並教導使用 Max/MSP/Jitter 物件導向程式設計工具，來設計準則作曲系統與即時音訊處理工具。主要內容將包含：準則作曲程式設計、即時音訊之播放與錄音系統設計、音色合成與再合成、數位效果器之設計。此外，本課程亦將介紹音訊偵測與分析技巧。學生將被要求以 Max/MSP/Jitter 設計聲音裝置、互動音樂展演系統、或音樂教學程式，透過實作來學習音樂、音訊相關的程式設計。
description.en: This course will focus upon algorithmic composition and real-time audio processing using object-oriented programming language Max/MSP/Jitter. Subjects including algorithmic composition, real-time audio recording, playback, synthesis, re-synthesis, and effects will be covered. Techniques about audio detection and analysis will also be introduced. Students will be asked to build a system with Max/MSP for sound installations, real-time interactive music, or music pedagogy.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍數位影像的相關技術，包括高動態範圍影像攝影、物理為根據彩現、感知為根據壓縮呈現，以及相關技術所建構的感知忠實圖像環境於實務與研究上的應用。
description.en: Introduce the related technologies of High Dynamic Range (HDR) Imaging, including HDR Photography, Physically Based Rendering, and Perceptually Based Tone-Mapping, and their applications in research and practice.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 以CAD繪圖軟體為教學範本，熟悉及應用繪圖指令，繪製機械之二度、三度空間的機械圖形，並能充分應用電腦的功能，以達輔助機械製圖及電腦輔助設計為目標。
description.en: equisite: ME151 or Consent of Instructor Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、Windows簡介、中文輸入、輸等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.
